overview: Stephanie Ernst Scott is the proprietor of Gus' Discount Tackle, a San Francisco fishing supply mainstay originally founded by her immigrant father Gus Ernst over 60 years ago. When the pandemic hit, Gus' was deemed an essential business and became a haven for customers seeking the outdoors as a welcomed escape. Whether your "Joe sixpack or Google Greg" Gus' Bait and Tackle will make you feel at home.
title: Weekend at Gus’
